name: Treasure Key 3.0
description:
Galaxy Folks is here again,  We welcome you All

Treasure Key 3.0 is released the third part in the Treasure Key series. All you need to do is complete the platforms and find the treasure and that's all. But it is not that easy you need to compete with hard level and avoid enemies and collect diamonds too. So what are you waiting for, Go on the Adventure awaits you......   

                              

 All Rights Reserved,  Made with Unity Game Engine, Coded using C# in Microsoft Visual Studio, Audio from Pixabay, Assets from Scratch.

Rated for 3+
Fantasy, Strain                            Game Instructions

WASD to move, Space to Shoot* *Shooting only in the 3rd level, Move on and avoid traps and enemies and find the Treasure chest to win.

System Requirements

Windows  - Any Windows PC with 200 MB RAM and 198 MB storage                              

 Linux          - Any GNU Debian based Linux Distribution with 200 MB RAM and 203 MB storage                                                                                                                                          

MacOS       - Any Macintosh Computer with 200 MB RAM and 227 MB storage
